description: The H15 file enables you to save your progress on your tax return so you can resume it at a later time. H&R Block allows you to access the H15 tax return file via the H&R Block Canada Tax Software desktop application or by uploading it to H&R Block Canada Online. H&R Block Canada tax return files reflect the year for which they contain tax data. The .H14 file contains tax return data for 2014 and .H13 contains tax data for 2013.
